name: Shaw Health Care Group
description: Shaw Health Care Group is a leading provider of health and social care services in the United Kingdom. Established in 1994, the company has grown to become a recognized name in the healthcare sector, delivering high-quality support and care to individuals across various settings, including residential care homes and supported living services. Shaw Health Care is committed to providing person-centered care, focusing on the individual needs and preferences of each client. Their services encompass elderly care, mental health support, and care for individuals with learning disabilities. The organization places a strong emphasis on staff training and development, ensuring that care is delivered by qualified and compassionate professionals. Shaw Health Care is dedicated to innovation in healthcare, utilizing technology to enhance service delivery and improve outcomes for patients. Their mission is to promote independence and dignity among those they serve, making a positive impact on the communities in which they operate. With a robust network of care facilities and a commitment to excellence, Shaw Health Care remains at the forefront of the UK health and social care industry, adapting to the evolving needs of society.

seo.meta_title: Shaw Health Care Group | Quality Health and Social Care Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Shaw Health Care Group, a leader in health and social care services in the UK, committed to providing high-quality, person-centered care.

faq.question: What services does Shaw Health Care provide?
faq.answer: Shaw Health Care provides residential care, supported living services, and specialized care for individuals with varying needs.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Shaw Health Care?
faq.answer: Ravi Nanda is the CEO of Shaw Health Care Group.

faq.question: Where is Shaw Health Care headquartered?
faq.answer: Shaw Health Care is headquartered in Birmingham, United Kingdom.

faq.question: When was Shaw Health Care founded?
faq.answer: Shaw Health Care was founded in 1994.
